Generative AI

Machine Learning & Creative AI Applications

Exploring the creative and practical applications of generative artificial intelligence and machine learning. From text generation to image synthesis, these projects investigate how AI can augment human creativity and solve complex problems across various domains.

AI Technologies

The cutting-edge AI tools and frameworks powering generative applications.

Large Language Models

GPT and other transformer-based models for text generation, analysis, and conversational AI applications.

Image Generation

Stable Diffusion and DALL-E for creating original artwork and visual content from text descriptions.

Custom Models

Fine-tuned and custom-trained models for specific applications and domain-specific tasks.

Video Generation

AI-powered video synthesis and generation tools for creating dynamic visual content from text prompts and images.

AI Philosophy

"Generative AI is not about replacing human creativity - it's about augmenting it, opening new possibilities for expression and problem-solving that were previously impossible."

My work with generative AI focuses on exploring the collaborative potential between human creativity and machine intelligence. Each project investigates how AI can serve as a creative partner, helping to generate ideas, solve problems, and create content that pushes the boundaries of what's possible.

The Waveform Generation

Generative AI & Machine Learning • Toronto, Canada
